title: Painting the market: generative diffusion models for financial limit order book simulation and forecasting
summary: This paper introduces a novel approach for simulating and forecasting financial limit order books (LOBs) by converting LOB data into a structured image format and applying diffusion models with inpainting. This addresses the challenges of high noise and complexity in financial market data.
usefulness_reason: The paper focuses on simulating and forecasting financial limit order books, which are inherently spatio-temporal in nature (price levels over time). The use of "generative diffusion models" and "structured image format" for LOB data implies a spatio-temporal representation and analysis.
